name: An Arboreous Climb
description:
Rise to the canopy of a sacred tree through lifting others (literally). In this side-scrolling adventure, you will fight monsters with the help of allies you meet on your way to the treetop. Lift up your friends and ascend together.

Play time: A few minutes

Play with full screen for a better experience.

Control:

A/D: Left/Right

Space: Jump

E: Pick Up/Drop

Q: Attack

Esc: Pause

This game is made for the 2021 Stareye Atlas game jam.

Please leave a comment below! We would love to hear your thoughts on our game. Any words of encouragement or constructive criticism is greatly appreciated.
